36 
37 #define UNARY_FUNCTOR(__name__,__op__) \
38 template <typename T> \
39 class __name__ \
40 { \
41 public: \
42  inline T operator()(const T& x) const { return __op__; } \
43 };
44 
46 UNARY_FUNCTOR(Log, std::log(x))
47 
48 UNARY_FUNCTOR(Exp, std::exp(x))
50 
51 UNARY_FUNCTOR(Sqrt, std::sqrt(x))
53 
54 #undef UNARY_FUNCTOR
55 
56 #define BINARY_FUNCTOR(__name__,__op__) \
57 template <typename T> \
58 class __name__ \
59 { \
60 public: \
61  inline T operator()(const T& x, const T& y) const { return __op__; } \
62 };
63 
65 BINARY_FUNCTOR(Plus, x + y);
66 
68 BINARY_FUNCTOR(PlusAbs, x + std::abs(y))
69 
70 BINARY_FUNCTOR(MaxAbs, std::max(x, std::abs(y)))
72 
73 BINARY_FUNCTOR(Max, std::max(x, y))
75 
76 BINARY_FUNCTOR(Min, std::min(x, y))
78 
79 BINARY_FUNCTOR(PlusSquare, x + y*y);
81 
82 #undef BINARY_FUNCTOR
83 
84 #define EQUALITY_FUNCTOR(__name__,__op__) \
85 template <typename T> \
86 class __name__ \
87 {\
88 public:\
89  inline void operator()(T& x, const T& y) const { x __op__ y; }\
90 };
91 
93 EQUALITY_FUNCTOR(Equals, =)
94 
95 EQUALITY_FUNCTOR(PlusEquals, +=)
97 
99 EQUALITY_FUNCTOR(MinusEquals, -=)
100 
102 template <typename T>
103 class PlusEqualsTimes
104 {
105 public:
106  PlusEqualsTimes(const T& a)
107  : m_a(a)
108  { }
109  inline void operator () (T& x, const T& y) const { x += m_a * y; }
110 private:
111  const T& m_a;
112 };
113 
115 template <typename T>
116 class MinusEqualsTimes
117 {
118 public:
119  MinusEqualsTimes(const T& a)
120  : m_a(a)
121  { }
122  inline void operator () (T& x, const T& y) const { x -= m_a * y; }
123 private:
124  const T& m_a;
125 };
126 
128 template <typename T>
129 class EqualsYDivAlpha
130 {
131 public:
132  EqualsYDivAlpha(const T& a)
133  : m_a(a)
134  {}
135  inline void operator()(T& x, const T& y) const { x = y / m_a; }
136 private:
137  const T m_a;
138 };
139 
141 template <typename T>
142 class PlusEqualsYDivAlpha
143 {
144 public:
145  PlusEqualsYDivAlpha(const T& a)
146  : m_a(a)
147  {}
148  inline void operator()(T& x, const T& y) const { x += y / m_a; }
149 private:
150  const T m_a;
151 };
